head.supplied: ¶ [Baron Dr. F. v. Muller in Melbourne has had the great goodness to send me a sample of manna from Eucalyptus viminalis, that interesting substance which has been studied by Thomson, Virey, and espe...

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found. The text given here is from Tollens (1885a), pp. 2614-5. M's letter is dated to early 1885 as Tollens's article was received by the journal on 13 October 1885 and quotes B84.11.02, of which presentation copies were being distributed in November 1884.

p.seg: [Hr. Baron Dr. F. v. Müller in Melbourne hat die grosse Güte gehabt, mir eine Probe Manna von Eucalyptus viminalis zu senden, jener interessanten Substanz, welche von Thomson, Virey, und besonders von Johnston und Berthelot untersucht worden ist, und über welche man in dem grossen Werke von F. v. Müller (Eucalyptographia l0th. decade Eucal. vimin.) eine Zusammenstellung der darüber vorhandenen Notizen findet.]
